description:
A mysterious witch that http://anidb.net/ch141210 [Kurumi Mirai] met when she was younger. She gave Kurumi a magic notebook urging her to become a magician one day.
Although her demeanor is very similar to http://anidb.net/ch142074 [Minami Suzuki] with whom she shares the same voice actress (http://anidb.net/cr61 [Horie Yui]) their relation to each other remains unknown.
name: Minejinias
